imdb.plot outline: Vital Signs is a 13-part high-definition television series featuring the Loma Linda University School of Medicine. The show is produced by Hope Channel, the official television network of the Seventh-day Adventist church, in close collaboration with Loma Linda University School of Medicine (LLUSM). Each 30-minute episode features in-studio and on-campus interviews with LLUSM faculty, staff and alumni; a "History Snapshot" with LLU Historian Richard Schaefer; and a "Student Story" documentary segment chronicling a year in the life of six medical students.
imdb.title: Vital Signs
plot: _Vital Signs_ (qv) is a 13-part high-definition television series featuring the Loma Linda University School of Medicine. The show is produced by Hope Channel, the official television network of the Seventh-day Adventist church, in close collaboration with Loma Linda University School of Medicine (LLUSM). Each 30-minute episode features in-studio and on-campus interviews with LLUSM faculty, staff and alumni; a "History Snapshot" with LLU Historian Richard Schaefer; and a "Student Story" documentary segment chronicling a year in the life of six medical students.
